mapper.insert: insert into group_buy_order_list( user_id, team_id, order_id, activity_id, start_time, end_time, goods_id, source, channel, original_price, deduction_price, status, out_trade_no, biz_id, create_time, update_time ) values( #{userId}, #{teamId}, #{orderId}, #{activityId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goodsId}, #{source}, #{channel}, #{originalPrice}, #{deductionPrice}, #{status}, #{outTradeNo}, #{bizId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select user_id, team_id, order_id, activity_id, start_time, end_time, goods_id, source, channel, original_price, deduction_price, status, biz_id from group_buy_order_list where out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo} and user_id = #{userId} and status = #{status}

select user_id, team_id, order_id, activity_id, start_time, end_time, goods_id, source, channel, original_price, deduction_price, status, biz_id from group_buy_order_list where user_id = #{userId} and team_id = #{teamId}
select out_trade_no from group_buy_order_list where team_id = #{teamId} and status = 1
select user_id, team_id, out_trade_no from group_buy_order_list where goods_id = #{goodsId} and user_id = #{userId} and status in (0, 1) and end_time > now() order by id desc limit #{count}

select user_id, team_id, out_trade_no from group_buy_order_list where goods_id = #{goodsId} and team_id in (select team_id from group_buy_order where goods_id = #{goodsId} and status = 0) and user_id != #{userId} and status in (0, 1) and end_time > now() order by id desc limit #{count}
select user_id, team_id, out_trade_no from group_buy_order_list where goods_id = #{goodsId} and status in (0, 1) group by team_id
